label: 八十種好
本: A Tale of Flowering Fortunes:  Annals of Japanese Aristocratic Life in the Heian Period (Volumes One and Two) . Stanford University Press . 1980
説明文: In addition to their thirty-two easily observable signs, buddhas and bodhisattvas are distinguishable by minute physical characteristics called the eighty attributes, some of which overlap with the signs (p. 623n).
